A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney has finally done it. We have been left with a dumbed down version of Star Wars rife with "forced humor" and nonsensical filler. 
The Last Jedi not only completely missed the tone of what Star Wars is\,  it butchered it. This new generation of movies are clearly being made for monetization of products rather than to tell a clear cohesive story with world (galaxy) building and purpose. 

I'm glad I paid $15 to watch Rian mock Star Wars fans and kill the character development George Lucas made in his original trilogy. Hopefully J.J. can right this ship and salvage what Rian has torn asunder.
